name: bacc
description: BACC by DZB assist the EPUB3 production with focus on Accessibility requirements

scripts.build:dist: npm run prebuild && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:backend: npm run prebuild:backend && mkdir dist/backend/report && cp backend/report/*.* dist/backend/report && mkdir dist/backend/helper && cp backend/helper/*.* dist/backend/helper && mkdir dist/backend/report/locales && cp backend/report/locales/*.* dist/backend/report/locales && mkdir dist/backend/routes && cp backend/routes/*.* dist/backend/routes && mkdir dist/backend/report/locales/ace_patch && cp backend/*.js dist/backend && cp backend/report/locales/ace_patch/*.* dist/backend/report/locales/ace_patch && cp backend/package.json dist/backend
scripts.postinstall: cd backend && npm install && cd ./../frontend && npm i
scripts.preminor: npm -f version minor && cd backend && npm -f version minor && cd ./../frontend && npm -f version minor
